descriptionNullable:
### Context

The dataset is organized into one folder (Brain_tumor_images) and contains two subfolders for each image category (Normal/Tumor) with 400 magnetic resonance (MR) images.
- Normal (170 MRI)
- Tumor (230 MRI)

### Acknowledgements

All the images collected for the data set have been downloaded from the Internet.

### Inspiration
Automated methods to detect and classify human diseases from medical images.
title: Brain MRI Images
subtitle: Brain tumor detection and classification
description:
### Context

The dataset is organized into one folder (Brain_tumor_images) and contains two subfolders for each image category (Normal/Tumor) with 400 magnetic resonance (MR) images.
- Normal (170 MRI)
- Tumor (230 MRI)

### Acknowledgements

All the images collected for the data set have been downloaded from the Internet.

### Inspiration
